definitions.definition: A thin, flat, circular plate or similar object.
definitions.example: A coin is a disk of metal.
Venus' disk cut off light from the Sun.
Turn the disk over, after it has finished.

definitions.definition: A disc - either a CD-ROM, an audio CD, a DVD or similar removable storage medium.
definitions.example: She burned some disks yesterday to back up her computer.

definitions.definition: A ring- or cup-shaped enlargement of the flower receptacle or ovary that bears nectar or, less commonly, the stamens.
A removable disk used for storing digital data, measuring between 2 and 8 inches diagonally and storing between 80 KB and 240 MB.
